remarks: Elemination of a restricted universal quantification under certain conditions.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Aug-2017.)
statement:
ralbinrald.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
ralbinrald.2 $e |- ( x e. A -> x = X ) $.
ralbinrald.3 $e |- ( x = X -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
ralbinrald $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A ps <-> th ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
$d th x $.
